pli-tv-pvr20:1.3: [Sp.5.479](): _Avippavāsena anāpattīti sahagāraseyyāya anāpatti_, “‘There no offense for one who is not staying apart’: there is no offense for sleeping in the same house.” This presumably refers to the nuns who are not allowed to stay apart. See [Kd 20:25.3.3](pli-tv-kd20:25.3.3)--25.3.5.
pli-tv-pvr20:1.4:
[Vmv.5.479](): _Pañhā mesāti ettha ma-kāro
padasandhikaro_, “_Pañhā mesā_: here the syllable ‘_ma_’ creates a junction between the words.”
